data.name: THE LEGEND OF HEROES: HAJIMARI NO KISEKI - C's Special Costume "White Knight"
data.detailed_description:
Contains original White Knight costume for character C.

White Knight x1

*Open [DLC] under [Item] page in the CAMP menu and select new items to receive them. The applicable characters must be friends in order to use costumes.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [Costume] in the CAMP menu.
data.about_the_game:
Contains original White Knight costume for character C.

White Knight x1

*Open [DLC] under [Item] page in the CAMP menu and select new items to receive them. The applicable characters must be friends in order to use costumes.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [Costume] in the CAMP menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
